name: Inquisitive
description: Inquisitives excel at uncovering secrets and unraveling mysteries. They use their keen perception and understanding of others to expose hidden evils and defeat creatures that prey upon ordinary folk.

ear_for_deceit.description: At 3rd level, you develop a keen ear for picking out lies.
mechanics: When making a Wisdom (Insight) check to determine if a creature is lying, treat a roll of 7 or lower on the d20 as an 8.

eye_for_detail.description: At 3rd level, you can use a bonus action to enhance your investigative skills.
mechanics: Use a bonus action to make a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a hidden creature or object, or an Intelligence (Investigation) check to uncover or decipher clues.

insightful_fighting.description: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to understand an opponent's tactics and exploit them.
mechanics: As a bonus action, make a Wisdom (Insight) check against a creature's Charisma (Deception) check.
If successful, you can use your Sneak Attack against that target even without advantage on the attack roll, but not if you have disadvantage.
This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until you successfully use this feature against a different target.

steady_eye.description: At 9th level, your observational skills improve with movement.
mechanics: Gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) or Intelligence (Investigation) checks if you move no more than half your speed on the same turn.

unerring_eye.description: At 13th level, you can detect illusions and magical deceptions.
mechanics: As an action, sense the presence of illusions, shapechangers not in their original form, and other magic designed to deceive the senses within 30 feet, provided you aren't blinded or deafened.
You detect that an effect is attempting to trick you but gain no insight into what is hidden or its true nature.
Use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), regaining all uses on a long rest.

eye_for_weakness.description: At 17th level, you exploit a creature's weaknesses more effectively.
mechanics: While your Insightful Fighting feature is applied to a creature, your Sneak Attack damage against that creature increases by 3d6.
